title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Karbandia has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Karbandia has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Karbandia has the higher money supply.

The response states that Karbandia has the higher money supply in Year 2 and explains that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Karbandia has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Karbandia has the higher money supply.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Bonvampton experienced the higher real interest rate and/or does not explain that Bonvampton had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

The response states that Bonvampton experienced the higher real interest rate and explains that Bonvampton had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Karbandia will move farther away from its production possibilities curve and/or does not explain that Karbandia’s real GDP decreased from $800 in Year 1 to $600 in Year 2 and cyclical unemployment will increase.

The response states that Karbandia will move farther away from its production possibilities curve and explains that Karbandia’s real GDP decreased from $800 in Year 1 to $600 in Year 2 and cyclical unemployment will increase.
